actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to define integrated auxiliaries of churches which are exempt from certain filing requirements.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to define integrated auxiliaries of churches which are exempt from certain filing requirements for tax-exempt organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to define integrated auxiliaries of churches which are exempt from certain filing requirements.
